name: Gregory Citro 30 Daypack - Unisex
description: Go get some all day nature. This might be your next favourite daypack. There are no compromises on comfort, with a meshy harness that sends cool air to your back on the hottest summer hike. And it's got handy features for happy hikers, like stash pockets and a pole attachment. So it's always easy to access exactly what you need right when you need it. At 30 litres, it's a great size for glorious alpine picnics and dawn-till-dusk adventures.VaporSpan harness channels air to your back, keeping you dry and comfortable.ActiveFlex shoulder harness combines perforated fabrics with a soft edge for day long comfort.Adjustable sternum strap with integrated safety whistle takes tension off the shoulders.Internal speedclip accommodates up to a 3L hydration bladder (sold separately).3D padded hipbelt distributes the weight around your hips with reduced pressure points.Zippered hipbelt pockets and top zippered accessory pocket keep personal items handy.Front and side stretch mesh pockets increase your storage options.Tool attachment with bungee cord lets you attach a hiking pole.Sunglasses keeper on the shoulder strap.Recommended load: up to 11.3 kg.
